result.adr_address: Winston Churchill St, 14, Kyiv, Ukraine, 02100
result.name: ПОМИНАЛЬНАЯ ДАРНИЦА

reviews.text: One star for the presence of paper towels and toilet paper in the bathroom. A 60* meter hall on the ground floor of a residential building, divided in half by a rag partition: guests at the same table are forced to take part in the neighbors’ wake: tears, hysterics, laughter and constant noise, in order to hear the neighbor you have to speaking in your ear...Organizing the seating of people at tables is the subject of a separate post: at 9:00 they called the administrator with a request to add a table and set another +15 people to the already ordered. As a result, at 13:15, having arrived at the appointed lunch time, 40 We waited for minutes while one waitress directed the guests where to get a table, dishes, cutlery, napkins and how to arrange it all, because... There were no passages in the hall at all!!! People were sitting at an empty table, there was no food on it: either it wasn’t in the kitchen or it wasn’t brought? Plates of hot borscht were passed around by 40 people, because the waitress could not get to the table... That is, some of the guests ate only cold appetizers, and some hot... When the pancakes were brought out: three plates, the waitress found among guests the widow of the deceased and placed them next to her, demonstratively... Shock! And at 15:15 we were informed that it was time to leave, because 2 hours were allotted for lunch, and there were a lot of us and it was time to pack up in order to leave on time. ..And the fact that people could not be seated on time and were left half-starved by some administration did not remember and did not apologize. The bill was in full....DO NOT SPEND NERVES AND MONEY, ESPECIALLY ON A SORRY DAY, COMING HERE FOR THE FUNERAL DINNER...LOOK FOR OTHER LOCATIONS..

Thanks for the help. Everything was quickly agreed and organized in a timely manner. Dishes of ordinary home cooking, without claims to sophistication and exclusivity, but everything is tasty and appropriate. Salads, cuts - fresh. What should have been hot was hot.

It was in December 2022, my husband died, work colleagues and relatives were invited, thank God that colleagues at the last moment decided to remember themselves because the food was inedible, absolutely all dishes and it was terrible. Who asks for advice on the refectory - I DO NOT RECOMMEND it to anyone.

On August 6, we buried the dearest person in the world - my mother. A memorial lunch was ordered at the Pominalna cafe. Nine years ago, we already ordered lunch at this cafe and were very satisfied with the quality of food and service.
I did not think that this time there would be such a disappointment.
Borscht was with sugar and absolutely not salty, not tasty. The fish under the vegetables consisted of the tails themselves with uncut fins. Pancakes with meat - the pancake itself was so sweet that it was difficult to understand that it was a pancake with meat. The cabbage rolls turned out to be inedible at all - the cabbage was so hard that they had to be cooked for more than 1.5 hours at home.
The cutlets remained on the plates uneaten, they were not very tasty.
About everything else - herring, salads, you can not write, the quality leaves much to be desired.
It is very unpleasant to me that with the cost of the memorial dinner of UAH 500 per person, the food turned out to be of poor quality.
I ask the management of the company to pay attention to my review, because I know what the service was before and how it has become. People turn to you for help in very difficult and sad times, so I wish you to improve your work and that we can recommend your cafe to our friends. Unfortunately, the last visits left a sad impression.

I do not recommend anyone to go to this particular funeral hall. That's horrible. The food is not edible at all!!! What they write in the Olivier menu is chopped potatoes, carrots, onions and an unknown substance (like mayonnaise). You won't find peas or sausage in this salad. Stuffed cabbage is actually something like salted rice wrapped in last year’s cabbage. I sent photos of pancakes and pies too. You can't eat this!!! The air stinks musty. They say the air conditioning is on. There are no staff (there was no one to even take out this gray smelly slurry, what they call borscht. The prices are very inflated (in this particular establishment.) We ordered to take us on our last journey, but what we got was a disgrace!!!!!
